vision: Automate ServiceNow Discovery operations through a FastMCP agent that schedules scans, analyzes results, remediates failures, and manages discovery patterns and credentials

phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Project structure, ServiceNow REST client, FastMCP server skeleton, configuration management, and base models. Establishes the core infrastructure every subsequent phase builds upon.

milestones.name: MCP server starts and responds to health-check
milestones.description: MCP server starts, connects to ServiceNow instance, and responds to a health-check tool call with real instance metadata

phases.name: Core Discovery Tools
phases.description: Implement the primary MCP tools for discovery operations: scheduling scans, checking status, managing credentials, and managing IP ranges. These are the bread-and-butter operations every ServiceNow Discovery admin needs.

milestones.name: Core discovery tools operational with real API
milestones.description: All four core discovery tools (schedule_discovery_scan, get_discovery_status, list_discovery_schedules, manage_discovery_ranges) are functional with real ServiceNow REST API calls

phases.name: Analysis and Remediation
phases.description: Advanced tools for analyzing discovery scan results, remediating common failures, managing CI classification patterns, computing discovery health metrics, and comparing discovery runs over time.

milestones.name: Analysis and remediation tools operational
milestones.description: analyze_discovery_results, remediate_discovery_failures, get_discovery_patterns, get_discovery_health, and compare_discovery_runs tools are operational against real ServiceNow data

phases.name: Testing
phases.description: Comprehensive test suite covering unit tests for every module, integration tests against a real ServiceNow instance, and end-to-end MCP protocol tests. Target: at least 80% code coverage.

milestones.name: 80% test coverage with integration tests passing
milestones.description: Test suite passes with at least 80% code coverage; integration tests confirm every MCP tool works against a real ServiceNow instance

phases.name: Documentation and Deployment
phases.description: Production-ready README, API reference docs, Docker containerization, CI/CD pipeline, and release packaging. Makes the project deployable and maintainable.

milestones.name: Fully documented, containerized, and CI/CD ready
milestones.description: Project is fully documented, containerized with Docker, has a working CI/CD pipeline, and can be installed via pip or run as a container
